radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy bibasilar opacities in the setting of low lung volumes likely reflecting atelectasis; however, unable to exclude early infection.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the cervical spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: Anterolisthesis of C4 on C5, likely chronic; no fractures; moderate to severe multilevel degenerative changes with moderate to severe multilevel neural foraminal stenosis.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Ultrasound of the liver or gallbladder
radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour, no suspicious liver mass; anechoic avascular fluid collection near the gallbladder fossa measures 2.4 x 1.4 x 3.1 cm, compared to 3.8 x 1.8 cm on prior; no ascites; cholelithiasis without gallbladder distention.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Anechoic avascular fluid collection decreased in size from 3.8 x 1.8 cm on prior to 2.4 x 1.4 x 3.1 cm.
